mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rotunda key
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: University President Colgate W. Darden Jr. accepts the original key to the Rotunda from Louis S. Greene, UVa alumnus. The key, used before the Rotunda burned in 1895, was given to Mr. Greene's father when he was a student at the University. Watching the presentation are, left to right, Admiral William F. Halsey, University President Colgate W. Darden Jr., Louis S. Greene, Mrs. Louis Greene (donor's mother), Ann Carter Greene (donor's daughter), Mrs. Louis S. Greene (donor's wife).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
